text: Taaham agar in logon ki be-rukhi tumse bardasht nahin hoti to agar tum mein kuch zoar hain to zameen mein koi surang dhundo ya Aasmaan mein seedi (ladder) lagao aur inke paas koi nishani laney ki koshish karo. Agar Allah chahta to in sabko hidayat par jamaa kar sakta tha, lihaza nadaan mat bano
